plugins.name: Flow Linker
plugins.description:
In large-scale design projects, prototyping every screen-to-screen interaction isn’t always practical. With dozens or even hundreds of screens, building interactive flows becomes time-consuming and sometimes infeasible, especially when deadlines are tight or priorities shift.


Yet developers and stakeholders still need clarity. They rely on understanding how different screens connect, what the logical flow of a user journey looks like, and where transitions happen even without full prototypes.


That’s where Flow Link comes in.


Rather than investing hours in building out detailed prototypes, Flow Link lets you visually map out interactions using clean, orthogonal connectors. These lines don’t just show flow—they’re configurable, styled, navigable, and reusable. And with frame linking, viewers can even jump directly to connected screens, making your Figma file interactive in structure, even without full prototyping.


Flow Link fills the gap between rapid design iteration and clear developer handoff making complex projects more navigable, understandable, and scalable.
plugins.tagline: Your Figma Flow, Made Effortless.

plugins.description: Convert your Figma designs into AI-friendly JSON to enhance prompt quality and accelerate code generation. With built-in image detection and download, your visuals are captured seamlessly. Output files are structured and optimized—ready to send to AI agents for fast, accurate implementation. Transform your design into clean, usable code in minutes — no manual handoff, no guesswork.

plugins.name: Extractor
plugins.description:
Components as you go.


As you design, systems, patterns, and components naturally emerge. With Extractor, you can select your working frames, instantly extract them to a component, and automatically replace the original selection with a component instance.


This approach lets you focus on the details while future-proofing designs and aligning process more closely with development.


Simply select your frames and access the "Extractor" command using CMD + P.


Feedback Form ->
plugins.tagline: Components as you go

plugins.name: Nexus
plugins.description:
Nexus is a Figma plugin designed to seamlessly sync content from Google Sheets while automatically updating text layers and their names.


Built for designers and product teams, Nexus eliminates manual copy-pasting by connecting your Figma files to a centralized content source. Select a language, pick the texts you need, and apply them in one click — layer names and content are updated instantly.


✅ Real-time sync with Google Sheets

✅ Automatic update of text layer content

✅ Structured layer renaming (#BODY.x, #CTA.x)

✅ Clean, intuitive interface for efficient workflows


Save time. Stay consistent. Focus on design.

Nexus handles the repetitive work — you focus on creating.
plugins.tagline: Power Your Workflow

136280.name: Nexus
136280.description:

plugins.name: Lokaliser
plugins.description:
Translate smarter, without the bloat.


Lokaliser.io is a lightweight, no-fuss translation management plugin built for lean teams who want to scale globally — without dealing with overwhelming tools.

With this plugin, you can:

🔗 Connect your Figma design to a Lokaliser project

🏷 Assign and manage translation keys right in your file

🔄 Sync keys to/from Lokaliser Cloud (Import / Export - Sync ↓ / Sync ↑)

📌 Keep your UI copy structured, ready for localization

No over-complicated workflows. No unused features. Just what your team needs to make product localization fast, collaborative, and clean.


→ Start your 14-day trial

→ Manage your projects in Lokaliser Dashboard


💡 Perfect for designers, devs & product teams working on multilingual apps & webs. Built by a team who values clarity and simplicity — just like you.

accepted.name: Lokaliser.io
accepted.description: Lokaliser is a realistic, rapid, and affordable Translation Management System built for startups and growing teams who want to localize without enterprise bloat

plugins.tagline: Sync and manage your translation keys directly inside Figma.

plugins.name: LayAuto Plugin
plugins.description:
LayAuto is a responsive SVG layout generator that creates customizable grid-based designs with text and images, perfect for quick visual mockups and design assets.


This Figma plugin imports LayAuto designs by converting the SVG code into accurately positioned Figma elements, while preserving multiline text, shapes, and styling.

plugins.name: Figma to osu!framework
plugins.description:
A third-party plugin to convert Figma elements to osu!framework code


Supported features:

  1. Basic layout (RelativeSizeAxes, Anchor/Orign, Padding, etc.)
  2. Converting cornerRadius to masking containers
  3. Linear Gradients (Both simple as well as multi-stop gradients work as long as they're horizontal or vertical)
  4. Text (Only one style per text element supported)

plugins.name: Replacer
plugins.description:
You select the object / component in figma and run this plugin.

For color groups: It automatically scans for "groups" and will do it's best to replace it with color variables that share the same naming structure.

For color variables, or plain colors: You select the color / variable to be replaced (target) and select the color to replace it with (source).

Done.

☑ Panel will remember what function you used last time.

☑ Works with gradient stops, colors in text fields and drop/inner shadows.
plugins.tagline: Replaces colors based on their "group" or per link to a color variable.

For color variables, or plain colors: You select the color / variable to be replaced (target) and select the color to replace it with (source).

Done.

☑ Panel will remember what function you used last time.

127834.release_notes: Added a "Delete" button to remove selected styles
127834.tagline: Replaces colors based on their "group" or per link to a color variable.

plugins.name: frameToGroup
plugins.description:
frameToGroup converts frames into organised groups while retaining essential visual properties.


✨ Key Features

✅ Effortless Conversion – Convert frames into neatly structured groups while keeping fills, strokes, and effects intact.

✅ Nested Frame Handling – Automatically processes nested frames for a well-organised layer structure.

✅ Style Preservation – Retains local styles and effects using asynchronous processing.

✅ User-Friendly UI – Simple, intuitive interface with one-click conversion.

✅ Continuous Workflow – Keep the plugin open for multiple conversions without interruptions.


✨ How to Use

  1. Select the frames you wish to convert in your Figma document.
  2. Click "Convert Frames to Groups" in the plugin UI.
plugins.tagline: Convert Frames to Groups While Retaining Styles

119879.description:

plugins.name: 一键翻译元素 Quick Translate
plugins.description:
Introduction

Quick Translate is a Figma plugin designed to help you instantly translate selected text elements into different languages with just one click. Save time and improve your workflow by translating text directly within your design files.


Function Description

  1. Translate selected text elements into a specified target language.
  2. Supports multiple languages and automatic translation of all text layers in a Figma selection.
  3. Easy-to-use interface to select languages and apply translations quickly.
  4. Ideal for designers working on multilingual projects or collaborating with global teams.


How to Use

  1. Select one or more text elements in your Figma file.
  2. Open the plugin from the "Plugins" menu.
  3. Choose the target language for translation.
  4. Click the "Translate" button, and the selected text will be replaced with the translated version.


Notes

  1. Ensure your Figma selection includes text elements, as the plugin only works with text layers.
  2. The translation may vary depending on the accuracy of the API and the language selected.
  3. For optimal results, select only relevant text elements to avoid unnecessary API calls.


介绍

Quick Translate 是一款 Figma 插件，旨在帮助您一键翻译选中的文本元素。通过该插件，您可以直接在 Figma 文件中将文本翻译为不同语言，节省时间，提高工作效率。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的文本元素翻译为指定的目标语言。
  2. 支持多种语言，并自动翻译 Figma 选择中的所有文本图层。
  3. 提供简单易用的界面，可以快速选择语言并应用翻译。
  4. 适用于多语言项目的设计师，或者与全球团队协作的设计师。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 文件中选择一个或多个文本元素。
  2. 从“插件”菜单打开插件。
  3. 选择目标翻译语言。
  4. 点击“翻译”按钮，选中的文本将被翻译并替换。


注意事项

  1. 请确保您的 Figma 选择包含文本元素，因为插件只支持文本图层。
  2. 翻译效果可能会根据 API 的准确性和所选语言有所不同。
  3. 为了获得最佳效果，建议只选择相关的文本元素，以避免不必要的 API 请求。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Quick Translate: Instant Translation for Figma Elements

plugins.name: 画板json导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin is designed to help users export detailed JSON data of selected nodes, including auto layout information, Frame nesting relationships, text properties, and more. With this plugin, users can easily retrieve structured data from design elements, facilitating data analysis, secondary development, or documentation.


功能

  1. Export complete JSON data of selected nodes, including properties like type, name, size, position, fills, strokes, and more.
  2. Support exporting text content, font name, font size, and other properties of text nodes.
  3. Support nested export of nodes such as Frame, Group, Component, and Instance, preserving the full hierarchical structure.
  4. Complete export of auto layout information, including layout mode, primary and secondary axis alignment, padding, and spacing.
  5. Safely serialized JSON data export ensures compatibility and completeness.


Usage Instructions

  1. Select one or more nodes from which you want to export data.
  2. Click the export button in the plugin, and the plugin will automatically extract all relevant information from the selected nodes and generate JSON data.
  3. The exported JSON data will be displayed in the plugin interface, allowing users to copy or download it for further use.


Notes

  1. This plugin currently supports exporting properties of common node types such as Frame.
  2. Ensure that the selected node types are supported by the plugin; otherwise, related data might not be exportable.
  3. If errors occur during the export process, check whether the nodes contain excessive nesting or complex properties. Simplify the structure if needed and try again.


简介

本插件旨在帮助用户导出选定节点的详细 JSON 数据，包括节点的自动布局信息、Frame 嵌套关系、文本属性等。通过此插件，用户可以轻松地获取设计元素的结构化数据，便于进行数据分析、二次开发或文档记录。


功能

  1. 导出选定节点的完整 JSON 数据，包括节点的类型、名称、尺寸、位置、填充、边框等属性。
  2. 支持导出文本节点的文本内容、字体名称、字号等属性。
  3. 支持 Frame、Group、Component、Instance 等节点类型的嵌套导出，保留完整的层次结构。
  4. 自动布局信息的完整导出，包括布局模式、主次轴对齐方式、填充和间距等。
  5. 导出的 JSON 数据经过安全序列化，确保兼容性和完整性。


使用说明

  1. 选中一个或多个需要导出数据的节点。
  2. 在插件中点击导出按钮，插件将自动提取选定节点的所有相关信息并生成 JSON 数据。
  3. 导出的 JSON 数据将会显示在插件界面中，用户可以复制或下载该数据用于其他用途。


注意事项

  1. 本插件目前只支持导出 Frame节点类型的属性。
  2. 请确保选定的节点类型受插件支持，否则可能无法导出相关数据。
  3. 如果导出过程中出现错误，请检查节点是否包含过多层次的嵌套或复杂的属性，建议简化结构后再试。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: The plugin quickly exports selected frame JSON data from Figma for other uses.

138833.name: 画板json导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro
138833.description:
Introduction

This plugin is designed to help users export detailed JSON data of selected nodes, including auto layout information, Frame nesting relationships, text properties, and more. With this plugin, users can easily retrieve structured data from design elements, facilitating data analysis, secondary development, or documentation.


功能

  1. Export complete JSON data of selected nodes, including properties like type, name, size, position, fills, strokes, and more.
  2. Support exporting text content, font name, font size, and other properties of text nodes.
  3. Support nested export of nodes such as Frame, Group, Component, and Instance, preserving the full hierarchical structure.
  4. Complete export of auto layout information, including layout mode, primary and secondary axis alignment, padding, and spacing.
  5. Safely serialized JSON data export ensures compatibility and completeness.


Usage Instructions

  1. Select one or more nodes from which you want to export data.
  2. Click the export button in the plugin, and the plugin will automatically extract all relevant information from the selected nodes and generate JSON data.
  3. The exported JSON data will be displayed in the plugin interface, allowing users to copy or download it for further use.


Notes

  1. This plugin currently supports exporting properties of common node types such as Frame.
  2. Ensure that the selected node types are supported by the plugin; otherwise, related data might not be exportable.
  3. If errors occur during the export process, check whether the nodes contain excessive nesting or complex properties. Simplify the structure if needed and try again.


简介

本插件旨在帮助用户导出选定节点的详细 JSON 数据，包括节点的自动布局信息、Frame 嵌套关系、文本属性等。通过此插件，用户可以轻松地获取设计元素的结构化数据，便于进行数据分析、二次开发或文档记录。


功能

  1. 导出选定节点的完整 JSON 数据，包括节点的类型、名称、尺寸、位置、填充、边框等属性。
  2. 支持导出文本节点的文本内容、字体名称、字号等属性。
  3. 支持 Frame、Group、Component、Instance 等节点类型的嵌套导出，保留完整的层次结构。
  4. 自动布局信息的完整导出，包括布局模式、主次轴对齐方式、填充和间距等。
  5. 导出的 JSON 数据经过安全序列化，确保兼容性和完整性。


使用说明

  1. 选中一个或多个需要导出数据的节点。
  2. 在插件中点击导出按钮，插件将自动提取选定节点的所有相关信息并生成 JSON 数据。
  3. 导出的 JSON 数据将会显示在插件界面中，用户可以复制或下载该数据用于其他用途。


注意事项

  1. 本插件目前只支持导出 Frame节点类型的属性。
  2. 请确保选定的节点类型受插件支持，否则可能无法导出相关数据。
  3. 如果导出过程中出现错误，请检查节点是否包含过多层次的嵌套或复杂的属性，建议简化结构后再试。

plugins.name: WEMS for Figma
plugins.description:
WEMS is a powerful platform that transforms your Figma prototypes into fully functional websites or mobile app view in just a few clicks. Designed for modern creators and product teams, WEMS allows you to:


  1. Convert Figma designs into responsive websites or mobile app view
  2. Optimize pages with built-in SEO tools for website
  3. Add translations for multilingual support
  4. Integrate Lottie and Rive animations
  5. Embed MP4 or other embeddable videos (Youtube, Facebook, Vimeo, Twitch etc.)
  6. Support forms with inputs and data send to endpoint
  7. Integrate payment forms or buttons with own products
  8. Connect a custom domain
  9. Run A/B tests to experiment and improve
  10. Track performance with built-in analytics


With WEMS, you can go from design to deployment in record time — no coding required

plugins.name: tailwindcss inspector
plugins.description:
This plugin generates class names based on your tailwind.config.js file. For example:


If you've defined "brand": "var(--emphasis-brand)" in theme.extend.colors, when a button's background color uses the --emphasis-brand variable, the plugin will automatically generate the bg-brand class for you.

plugins.name: SpeX - Design to Code by AI
plugins.description:
SpeX – Design to Code by AI


Transform your Figma components into AI-readable specs for seamless design-to-code automation.


🔍 What is SpeX?

SpeX bridges design and development by exporting structured specifications from Figma—enabling AI tools like Cursor and GitHub Copilot to generate accurate, production-grade UI code that aligns with your actual components.


🎯 Who It's For

  1. Design system teams scaling reusable components
  2. Developers using AI coding assistants
  3. Product teams aiming for consistent handoffs
  4. Organizations enforcing structured design workflows


🚀 Key Capabilities


📋 AI-Ready Export

  1. Export to YAML/JSON with full style tokens
  2. Support nested components, variants, and instances
  3. Auto-detect and optimize SVG icons
  4. Generate component preview thumbnails


🔧 Fine-Tuning Metadata

  1. Add codeComponent and codeFilePath
  2. Auto-fill metadata via pattern recognition
  3. Visual tree browser with search and bulk editing


🗃 Component Record Management

  1. Full CRUD for structured records
  2. Sync from Notion, APIs, or JSON files
  3. Filterable views with fallback thumbnails
  4. Export component registry as JSON


🤖 Real-Time AI Integration

  1. WebSocket-based MCP bridge for tools like Cursor AI
  2. Real-time dashboard and analytics
  3. Serve specs, manifest, and previews on-demand
  4. Auto-reconnect and error resilience


🧭 How It Works

  1. Select Components – from your Figma file
  2. Fine-Tune – add mappings to your codebase (optional)
  3. Export or Connect – structured file export or live MCP server
  4. Generate Code – AI tools use the specs to write code that aligns with your system


📁 Output Structure (Simplified)

export-[timestamp]/
├── screen.yaml # Main screen specs
├── manifest.yaml # File manifest
├── components/ # Component specs
├── styles/ # Design token definitions
├── icons/ # SVG exports
├── previews/ # PNG previews


Example screen.yaml

# screen.yaml
screen:
id: "signup-screen-001"
name: "SignupForm"
type: "FRAME"

dimensions:
width: 375
height: 812

styleRefs:
fills:
- "@styles/fills#background-default"
typography:
- "@styles/typography#body-normal"

children:
- type: "INSTANCE_REF"
ref: "@components/TextField#username-field-001"
- type: "INSTANCE_REF"
ref: "@components/TextField#email-field-002"
- type: "INSTANCE_REF"
ref: "@components/TextField#password-field-003"
- type: "INSTANCE_REF"
ref: "@components/Button#signup-button-001"
- type: "INSTANCE_REF"
ref: "@components/TextLink#login-link-001"


This defines a form-based screen layout with multiple input fields, a button, and a link—referencing reusable components in the design system.


🔗 spex-mcp

Install the companion server to integrate with AI dev tools:

→ spex-mcp on npm


💡 Why SpeX?


For Designers

  1. Reduce handoff friction
  2. Track design usage across implementations


For Developers

  1. Avoid guesswork, get exact specs
  2. Leverage AI tools with full context


For AI Tools

  1. Access structured, hierarchical data
  2. Align generated code with real-world components


SpeX is where design systems meet automation. Your components. Your rules. Real code.
plugins.tagline: Built on your real components, not generic templates.

plugins.name: Font Detective
plugins.description:
Ever need to know exactly which fonts are in your project without clicking through dozens of text layers? Manually checking for fonts is slow and easy to miss one, especially in complex files.


Font Detective instantly scans your selection and provides a clean list of every font family it finds.


No more guesswork, no more hunting. ✨


How it works:


  1. Select a frame - Click on a single frame or select multiple frames
  2. Run "Font Detective" - One click and you're done
  3. Get results - Immediately see a complete list of all font families spotted within your selection. It's that simple!


Key Benefits:


  1. Quick Typography Audits - Get a fast and accurate inventory of the fonts in any file or component
  2. Maintain Consistency - Easily spot unwanted fonts that don't belong in your design system
  3. Streamline Cleanup - Use the generated list as a checklist to consolidate your font styles
  4. Effortless Handoff - Quickly provide a list of all used fonts to developers or teammates
  5. Simple & Fast - No complex settings. Just select and run for instant results


Perfect for designers, design teams, and anyone working with typography in Figma! 🎨


Feedback is welcome!

accepted.name: Lorenzo Brandimarte
accepted.description: Web and UI Designer | No-code developer

plugins.tagline: Font Detective scans your frame and provides a clean list of every font family it finds.

plugins.name: TokenWizard
plugins.description:
TokenWizard is your all-in-one starter tool for building consistent, scalable design systems in Figma. With just one click, it generates structured design tokens as Figma variables, creates corresponding color, text, and spacing styles, and even renders a beautiful visual palette preview right on your canvas.


Whether you're building a brand system from scratch or bringing order to design chaos, TokenWizard adapts to your needs. Choose which token types to include (Color, Spacing, Typography), pick base colors from the UI, and skip the hassle of manual setup. No duplicate styles, no redundant variables — everything is smartly created or updated in-place.


Designed for UX teams, solo designers, and developers alike, TokenWizard transforms repetitive setup into a streamlined, creative experience — so you can start designing with structure in minutes, not hours.

accepted.name: Shoaib Khalid
accepted.description: Google Certified UX/UI & Product Designer with 12+ years of experience designing user-friendly interfaces.

plugins.tagline: Auto-Generate Figma Variable Tokens, Styles & Color Palettes with a Click

138979.name: TokenWizard
138979.description:

With just one click, it generates structured design tokens as Figma variables, creates corresponding color, text, and spacing styles, and even renders a beautiful visual palette preview right on your canvas.


Whether you're building a brand system from scratch or bringing order to design chaos, TokenWizard adapts to your needs. Choose which token types to include (Color, Spacing, Typography), pick base colors from the UI, and skip the hassle of manual setup. No duplicate styles, no redundant variables — everything is smartly created or updated in-place.


Designed for UX teams, solo designers, and developers alike, TokenWizard transforms repetitive setup into a streamlined, creative experience — so you can start designing with structure in minutes, not hours.

plugins.name: RocketPen - Generate UI with AI and edit freely
plugins.description:
Product Introduction


RocketPen is a tool that leverages artificial intelligence (AI) to help users create UI designs.

RocketPen aims to significantly boost your productivity.


Value

📌Open Editing Permissions: AI-generated designs can be flexibly edited and modified

🚀Boost Design Efficiency: Smart generation replaces manual drawing

🎨Maintain Design Consistency: Automatically adapts to brand design specifications

💬Natural Language Interaction: Generate professional designs with simple descriptions

📱Multi-platform Design Support: Unified design for Web/Mobile/Desktop platforms

📦Design Asset Reuse: Convert existing websites into editable Figma files


Features

Text-to-Design Generation

Generate UI design drafts based on DesignTokens through text descriptions


Website-to-Design File Conversion

Convert any website into editable Figma design files, requires use with the Chrome extension RocketPenSelector


DesignToken

Support variables definition for DesignToken with visual DesignToken output


Quick Chart Generation

Support common chart types including bar charts, line charts, pie charts, radar charts, etc.


Precise Content Generation

Generate corresponding content through text descriptions within specified Frames


Precise Resource Import

Import icons, images and other resources through text descriptions:

Generate four high-definition animal images


Generate a navigation bar with four buttons: Chat, Contacts, Discover, Settings



Notes

🔒 Privacy Protection: We do not store any user data. Only DesignTokens (variables) are uploaded, and all generated design files remain stored locally on your device. Your data security is fully protected.


🚧 Development Status: This plugin is currently in active development. We're continuously refining the model and workflows to deliver higher-quality design outputs and an improved user experience.



Thank you for your support and understanding! If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to provide feedback.
plugins.tagline: Your Vision,AI-Powered.Generate UI designs instantly with AI, then edit freely to match your vision

plugins.name: Pinnaflow Collections
plugins.description:
Figma CMS Table Generator helps you structure CMS data directly in your Figma file, and export it as a Webflow-compatible CSV.


With this plugin, you can:


🗂 Create CMS Collections

Define fields with types like Plain Text, Rich Text, Image, Number, Date, or Switch — all directly in your Figma UI.


🧩 Add CMS Items

Populate data using a form-driven interface. Each item becomes a variant within your CMS component.


📤 Export CSV for Webflow

Download a ready-to-import CSV with your data structured according to Webflow CMS standards.


🎯 Apply CMS Data to Design

Inject field values into selected Figma elements by choosing collection, item, and field — no copy-pasting.


⚡ Real-Time Preview & Auto Validation

Live feedback lets you know when your component is ready for export, and disables the export button if any structure is invalid.


🖼 Responsive & Intuitive UI

A clean and responsive layout, with tooltips, modals, and auto-tab interactions for seamless workflow.


🛠 How to use:

Create a Collection

Go to the "Create Collection" tab → enter a collection name → define fields → click "Create Collection".


Add Items

Switch to "Create Item" → fill in values for each defined field → click "Create Item".


Export to CSV

Select the CMS component → click "Export CSV" in the Collection tab.


Apply Data to UI

In "Apply Data" tab → choose collection, item, and field → select a text layer in your design → click "Apply to Selected Element".


✅ Best Practices

Your CMS component must contain a frame named “CMS Properties”, with text layers in the format:

Field Name | Field Type


When applying data, make sure the selected element is a single text node.


Only one CMS component should be selected at a time when creating items or exporting.


Use consistent field names and valid types for clean CSV output and Webflow compatibility.
plugins.tagline: Create CMS collections in Figma and export them for Webflow import

137944.name: Pinnaflow Collections
137944.description:
Figma CMS Table Generator helps you structure CMS data directly in your Figma file, and export it as a Webflow-compatible CSV.


With this plugin, you can:


🗂 Create CMS Collections

Define fields with types like Plain Text, Rich Text, Image, Number, Date, or Switch — all directly in your Figma UI.


🧩 Add CMS Items

Populate data using a form-driven interface. Each item becomes a variant within your CMS component.


📤 Export CSV for Webflow

Download a ready-to-import CSV with your data structured according to Webflow CMS standards.


🎯 Apply CMS Data to Design

Inject field values into selected Figma elements by choosing collection, item, and field — no copy-pasting.


⚡ Real-Time Preview & Auto Validation

Live feedback lets you know when your component is ready for export, and disables the export button if any structure is invalid.


🖼 Responsive & Intuitive UI

A clean and responsive layout, with tooltips, modals, and auto-tab interactions for seamless workflow.


🛠 How to use:

Create a Collection

Go to the "Create Collection" tab → enter a collection name → define fields → click "Create Collection".


Add Items

Switch to "Create Item" → fill in values for each defined field → click "Create Item".


Export to CSV

Select the CMS component → click "Export CSV" in the Collection tab.


Apply Data to UI

In "Apply Data" tab → choose collection, item, and field → select a text layer in your design → click "Apply to Selected Element".


✅ Best Practices

Your CMS component must contain a frame named “CMS Properties”, with text layers in the format:

Field Name | Field Type


When applying data, make sure the selected element is a single text node.


Only one CMS component should be selected at a time when creating items or exporting.


Use consistent field names and valid types for clean CSV output and Webflow compatibility.
137944.tagline: Create CMS collections in Figma and export them for Webflow import

plugins.name: Harmony – Snap Any Design to Your System Styles
plugins.description:
Clean up designs by applying styles and variables from your design system!


This plugin automatically snaps every color, text style, spacing, and radius in your design to the nearest matching style token from your design system.


Disclaimer: the design styles and variables should be present in the file


Whether you’re importing AI-generated UIs or working with inconsistent layouts, this tool ensures pixel-perfect alignment to your style guide.


It identifies and merges duplicate styles, normalizes paddings and spacings to a consistent grid and applies variables also to the spacing padding from your design system-keeping your file tidy, lightweight, and production-ready.

Perfect for design system maintainers, UI/UX designers, and teams working with handoff-ready components.


✅ Matches colors using advanced perceptual comparison

✅ Aligns font sizes and weights to existing text styles

✅ Snaps corner radii and auto-layout spacing to your token grid

✅ Cleans unused styles with detailed before/after stats

✅ Works with selections or full-page scans


Please message any feedback or suggestion on sanjogbora@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Auto-apply your design system styles and variables to imported designs.

plugins.name: Pagify
plugins.description:
Pagify — Page Management Made Simple


This plugin simplifies page management in Figma with an intuitive interface for creating, organizing, and maintaining your project structure. Whether you're building complex design systems or managing multiple screens, Pagify streamlines page workflows so you can focus on design.


No more cluttered page panels or tedious manual work. Just drag, drop, and structure your pages with precision.


Key features:

  1. Create pages from existing elements
  2. Quick page renaming and deletion
  3. Separator pages for better organization
  4. Clean interface that stays out of your way
  5. Bulk operations for maximum efficiency

accepted.name: Pavel Grachev
accepted.description: Product designer. Focused on clarity, usability, and quality design systems.

plugins.tagline: Streamline your Figma pages, neat, clear, efficient
